'''15w36b''' is the twentieth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on September 2, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/09/minecraft-snapshot-15w36a/</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[15w36a]].

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Snowball]]s and [[egg]]s'''
* Now produce particles when thrown at an [[entity]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w36b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|669|Failing to place blocks in creative mode causes an animation.
|43601|Hunger is lost when standing in close proximity to mobs/<code>stat.walkOneCm</code> increases.
|67573|Snowballs and eggs do not produce particles when hitting entities.
|;dev
|87128|Minecraft does not create world icon if it is missing.
|;previous
|87869|Crash after stepping off pressure plate.
}}</onlyinclude>
